name: Samurai Traffic Cop
description:
Done for the DSOP Cart Jam!

“It’s a game”

“Hey, it plays!”

“Okay this is actually pretty fun”

“Why does cutting cars feel better than directing traffic”

 “It feels like I’m directing traffic in real life, which is a dream come true.”

Use W, A, S, D to direct traffic!

  • Point at a car, then point in the direction it wants to go.
  • If you point the wrong way, the car will attack!
  • If you're not fast enough, the cars will attack!

You do not gain points for attacking cars.

  • If they attack you, use the arrow keys to cut them down for disobeying the law.
  • If you're quick, you can chain multiple attacks together.

Earn points by directing traffic correctly- your score multiplier will go up each time you direct all cars in a round the right direction.

Good luck.
